About Me

Hi! My name is Yerzhan Torgayev and I'm a Software Engineer at Facebook,.

Passionate about Web and building beautiful, smart products. Mainly interested in Python, PHP and JavaScript. Previously worked at Petrel AI, HiPO, Lensmark.
